positions.title: Lab Assistant
positions.description:
• Worked on a Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement (BSEE) project, in order to develop a safe, low emission, in situ method to quickly separate the oil and water recovered from a skimming system, and utilize or burn off the recovered oil in the Arctic region.
• Managed a team of 6 students including graduate and undergraduate students.
• Wrote proposals, conducted experiments in small, intermediate and large scales with various combinations of parameters.
• Assisted in designing experimental setup, collected temperature and heat flux data from Signal Express, analyzed and visualized the results.
• Prepared thermocouples, machined components required for the project and developed a working prototype.
See less

positions.title: Electronics and Programming Intern

• Debugged the entire system and got it to work. Developed a C# GUI to facilitate the sensor testing....

positions.description:

• Have experience in conducting exams, grading and counseling.
